title: Sri Lanka Development bonds; US$152mn sold, more offered on tap
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – The government has sold 152.54 million US dollars of 6 months dollar denominated Sri Lanka Development Bonds at an auction from March 09 to 14, after offering 50 million dollars, data from the state debt office said.
Investors could buy more bonds at 9.48 percent until 16.03.2022.
The debt office also offered 1-year, 1-year 10-months, 2-year 10-months and 4-year 9-month bonds but there were no takes.
There was a bid for 2.5 million dollars for 1-year bonds which were not accepted.
